ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We built seven firm layers above you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We raised over you several secure (skies),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and built above you seven strong firmaments,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have We not made seven strong heavens above you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And built seven strong roofs above you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And We have built above you seven strong,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And We made above you seven strong ones,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And We have built above you seven strong ones,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And We have built above you seven strong (heavens),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have built above you seven mighty heavens,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And We have builded over you seven strong heavens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and build above you the seven mighty heavens?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And (have We not) built over you the seven firmaments,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And We have built above you seven strong (heavens),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And We built above you seven strong ones,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And built above you seven strong ones?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And constructed above you seven strong [heavens]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [78:12] and built above you seven mighty ones?, seven heavens (shidād is the plural of shadīda) that is to say, strong and sturdy unaffected by the passage of time,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And We have built) and We have created (above you) above your heads (seven strong (heavens)) seven thick heavens,
